code:
flowchart TD %% L++ Logic CAD: L++ Event Sequence Simulator state_idle(["idle
No blueprint loaded, waiting for input"]):::entry subgraph Processing state_ready(["ready
Blueprint loaded, ready to simulate"]):::state state_simulating(["simulating
Actively simulating, can dispatch events"]):::state end %% Transitions gate_t0s0{{"blueprint is None?"}}:::gate state_idle -- "LOAD" --> gate_t0s0 act_t0s0[["load_blueprint"]]:::action gate_t0s0 -- ✓ --> act_t0s0 act_t0s0 --> state_ready act_t2s0[["load_blueprint"]]:::action state_ready -- "LOAD" --> act_t2s0 act_t2s0 --> state_ready act_t3s0[["load_blueprint"]]:::action state_simulating -- "LOAD" --> act_t3s0 act_t3s0 --> state_ready gate_t4s0{{"blueprint is not None?"}}:::gate state_ready -- "START" --> gate_t4s0 act_t4s0[["init_simulation, render_status"]]:::action gate_t4s0 -- ✓ --> act_t4s0 act_t4s0 --> state_simulating act_t5s0[["dispatch_event"]]:::action state_simulating -- "DISPATCH" --> act_t5s0 act_t5s0 --> state_simulating act_t6s0[["set_context, get_available_events"]]:::action state_simulating -- "SET_CONTEXT" --> act_t6s0 act_t6s0 --> state_simulating act_t7s0[["get_available_events, render_status"]]:::action state_simulating -- "REFRESH" --> act_t7s0 act_t7s0 --> state_simulating act_t8s0[["evaluate_gates"]]:::action state_simulating -- "EVAL_GATES" --> act_t8s0 act_t8s0 --> state_simulating act_t9s0[["fork_simulation"]]:::action state_simulating -- "FORK" --> act_t9s0 act_t9s0 --> state_simulating gate_t10s0{{"forks is not None and len(f...?"}}:::gate state_simulating -- "SWITCH_FORK" --> gate_t10s0 act_t10s0[["switch_fork"]]:::action gate_t10s0 -- ✓ --> act_t10s0 act_t10s0 --> state_simulating gate_t11s0{{"trace is not None and len(t...?"}}:::gate state_simulating -- "STEP_BACK" --> gate_t11s0 act_t11s0[["step_back"]]:::action gate_t11s0 -- ✓ --> act_t11s0 act_t11s0 --> state_simulating act_t12s0[["set_sequence"]]:::action state_simulating -- "SET_SEQUENCE" --> act_t12s0 act_t12s0 --> state_simulating gate_t13s0{{"sequence is not None and le...?"}}:::gate state_simulating -- "RUN_SEQUENCE" --> gate_t13s0 act_t13s0[["run_sequence"]]:::action gate_t13s0 -- ✓ --> act_t13s0 act_t13s0 --> state_simulating act_t14s0[["fuzz_run"]]:::action state_simulating -- "FUZZ" --> act_t14s0 act_t14s0 --> state_simulating act_t15s0[["find_path"]]:::action state_simulating -- "FIND_PATH" --> act_t15s0 act_t15s0 --> state_simulating act_t16s0[["explore_state_space"]]:::action state_simulating -- "EXPLORE" --> act_t16s0 act_t16s0 --> state_simulating act_t17s0[["render_trace"]]:::action state_simulating -- "VIEW_TRACE" --> act_t17s0 act_t17s0 --> state_simulating gate_t18s0{{"state_space is not None?"}}:::gate state_simulating -- "VIEW_SPACE" --> gate_t18s0 act_t18s0[["render_state_space"]]:::action gate_t18s0 -- ✓ --> act_t18s0 act_t18s0 --> state_simulating gate_t19s0{{"trace is not None and len(t...?"}}:::gate state_simulating -- "EXPORT" --> gate_t19s0 act_t19s0[["export_trace"]]:::action gate_t19s0 -- ✓ --> act_t19s0 act_t19s0 --> state_simulating gate_t20s0{{"blueprint is not None?"}}:::gate state_simulating -- "IMPORT" --> gate_t20s0 act_t20s0[["import_trace"]]:::action gate_t20s0 -- ✓ --> act_t20s0 act_t20s0 --> state_simulating act_t21s0[["reset_simulation"]]:::action state_simulating -- "RESET" --> act_t21s0 act_t21s0 --> state_simulating state_simulating -- "STOP" --> state_ready act_t23s0[["unload_blueprint"]]:::action state_ready -- "UNLOAD" --> act_t23s0 act_t23s0 --> state_idle act_t24s0[["unload_blueprint"]]:::action state_simulating -- "UNLOAD" --> act_t24s0 act_t24s0 --> state_idle %% Styling - ALL shapes have explicit fill and black text classDef entry fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#01579b,stroke-width:3px,color:#000 classDef terminal fill:#c8e6c9,stroke:#2e7d32,stroke-width:3px,color:#000 classDef errorState fill:#ffcdd2,stroke:#c62828,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 classDef state fill:#ffffff,stroke:#6a6aaa,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 classDef gate fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#e65100,stroke-width:2px,color:#000 classDef action fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1565c0,stroke-width:1px,color:#000
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
